plugin.name: Infamy_mobs
plugin.author: Littleman
plugin.purpose: Chart for Infamy mobs and rooms

trigger.match: ^(.*?) The brains of Rok lay here\.$
trigger.send: ColourNote ("Black", "Black", "") ColourNote ("Black", "Black", "") ColourNote ("Cyan", "Black", "********** Type ", "Green", "Black", "Infamy-mobs", "Cyan", "Black", " for a chart of mobs and room. **********") ColourNote ("Black", "Black", "") ColourNote ("Black", "Black", "")

alias.send: ColourNote ("Cyan", "Black", "----------------------- SECTION 1 ------------------------") ColourNote ("Green", "Black", "", "Black", "Black","") ColourNote ("Green", "Black", "--------MOB
